p: Finally, the role of aging on the IFN response after HMPV infection, has been largely understudied. However, data in BALB/c mice indicate that aged animals have an impaired capacity to produce IFN-Î³ that the younger counterparts [ 110]. Thus, it appears that premature or elderly individuals have a limited capacity to mount an IFN response to HMPV. However, future studies are needed to understand the mechanisms underlying those effects.
